segments.text: Boy , it looks like everyone in your family is here , from young to old .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Easter's a good day for reunions . The family goes to church together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And after church they come here for lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yup , a big potluck buffet . And then-notice there are no children around ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The kids wait in the house while the grownups hide these . Hide away , Yi-jun !
segments.speaker: S2
